LanguageData.Expedition33_EvequeRace.label: Bishop
LanguageData.Expedition33_EvequeRace.description: A divine guardian corrupted by chromatic energies, wielding sacred light as both blessing and weapon.
LanguageData.Expedition33_EvequeRace.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Expedition33_GobluRace.label: Goblu
LanguageData.Expedition33_GobluRace.description: A primitive creature with savage instincts and formidable agility, defender of his sacred flower field.
LanguageData.Expedition33_GobluRace.tools.teeth.label: teeth
LanguageData.Expedition33_GobluRace.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Expedition33_SakapatateRobusteRace.label: Robust Sakapatate
LanguageData.Expedition33_SakapatateRobusteRace.descr: An ancestral plant guardian, imposing mass of flesh and armored tubers.
LanguageData.Expedition33_SakapatateUltimeRace.label: Ultimate Sakapatate
LanguageData.Expedition33_SakapatateUltimeRace.descri: The ultimate evolution of plant guardians, incarnation of millenary natural power.
LanguageData.Expedition33_FrancoisRace.label: François
LanguageData.Expedition33_FrancoisRace.description: A giant melancholic turtle with bioluminescent mushrooms on his shell. Despite his gruff attitude, he hides deep sadness.
LanguageData.Expedition33_MaitreLampesRace.label: Lamp Master
LanguageData.Expedition33_MaitreLampesRace.descriptio: Lord of light, manipulator of illumination and creator of spectral lamps.
LanguageData.Expedition33_MaitreLampesRace.tools.head: head
LanguageData.Expedition33_DualisteRace.label: Dualist
LanguageData.Expedition33_DualisteRace.description: A cosmic entity incarnating the perfect balance between light and darkness.
LanguageData.Expedition33_RenoirRace.label: Commander Renoir
LanguageData.Expedition33_RenoirRace.description: A corrupted general of Expedition 33, master strategist of tactical warfare.
LanguageData.Expedition33_RenoirRace.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Expedition33_SireneRace.label: Siren
LanguageData.Expedition33_SireneRace.description: An Axon from the depths, sonic entity capable of breaking minds with her voice.
LanguageData.Expedition33_SireneRace.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Expedition33_VisagesRace.label: Visages
LanguageData.Expedition33_VisagesRace.description: A multiform Axon, collective of consciousnesses capable of changing identity.
LanguageData.Expedition33_PaintressRace.label: Paintress
LanguageData.Expedition33_PaintressRace.description: A reality weaver, cosmic artist capable of reshaping existence itself.
LanguageData.Expedition33_MimeRace.label: Mime
LanguageData.Expedition33_MimeRace.description: A silent entity, master of invisible illusions and intangible barriers.
LanguageData.Expedition33_MimeRace.tools.teeth.label: teeth
LanguageData.Expedition33_MimeRace.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Gestral.label: gestral
LanguageData.Gestral.description: Gestrals are unique beings resembling wooden puppets with brushes for heads. Friendly but simple-minded, they love to fight and respect powerful warriors. Their ability to resurrect at the Sacred River makes them carefree in the face of danger.
LanguageData.Gestral.tools.Left_wooden_fist.label: left wooden fist
LanguageData.Gestral.tools.Right_wooden_fist.label: right wooden fist
LanguageData.Nevron.label: nevron
LanguageData.Nevron.description: A once-living creature, now corrupted by The Gommage...
LanguageData.Nevron.tools.griffes_chromatiques.label: chromatic claws
LanguageData.Nevron.tools.morsure_corrosive.label: corrosive bite
LanguageData.Nevron.tools.charge_chromatique.label: chromatic charge
LanguageData.Pitank.label: pitank
LanguageData.Pitank.description: An evolved Nevron, fusion of several corrupted creatures...
LanguageData.Pitank.tools.griffes_massives.label: massive claws
LanguageData.Pitank.tools.mchoires_broyeuses.label: crushing jaws
LanguageData.Pitank.tools.charge_dvastatrice.label: devastating charge
LanguageData.NevronDechutRace.label: fallen nevron
LanguageData.NevronDechutRace.description: A human corrupted by The Gommage, transformed into a bestial creature but retaining intelligence...
LanguageData.Expedition_VersoColon.label: Verso
LanguageData.Expedition_VersoColon.tools.teeth.label: teeth
LanguageData.Expedition_VersoColon.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Expedition33_Uniform.label: expeditionary uniform
LanguageData.Expedition33_Uniform.description: An elegant Belle Époque military uniform worn by Expedition 33 members. Its golden buttons and epaulettes testify to the rank of the wearer. Offers basic protection against Gommage effects.
LanguageData.Expedition33_AntiGommageShield.label: anti-gommage shield
LanguageData.Expedition33_AntiGommageShield.descripti: A personal protection device that generates a protective field against Gommage effects. Its golden circuits sparkle with mystical energy. Has 3 protection charges before depletion.
LanguageData.Expedition33_ReinforcedArmor.label: expedition reinforced armor
LanguageData.Expedition33_ReinforcedArmor.description: Advanced combat armor developed specifically to fight entities related to the Paintress. Its plates engraved with mystical symbols offer superior protection against artistic attacks.
LanguageData.Expedition33_OfficerHat.label: expedition officer cap
LanguageData.Expedition33_OfficerHat.description: A military cap adorned with golden stripes and anti-Gommage symbols, worn by Expedition 33 officers. It confers authority and respect among troops while offering mental protection against Gommage psychological effects.
LanguageData.Expedition33_MilitaryBoots.label: reinforced expedition boots
LanguageData.Expedition33_MilitaryBoots.description: Robust leather boots worn by expeditionaries, reinforced with metal plates and anti-slip soles. Designed to withstand long marches and difficult terrain during missions against mysterious entities.
LanguageData.Expedition33_Headquarters.label: expedition headquarters
LanguageData.Expedition33_Headquarters.description: A command building used by Expedition 33 to plan their missions against The Gommage. Contains maps, secret files and communication equipment. Allows research of anti-Gommage technologies.
LanguageData.Expedition33_CursedAgeDetector.label: cursed age detector
LanguageData.Expedition33_CursedAgeDetector.descripti: A sophisticated device that analyzes artistic fluctuations to detect the age currently painted on the Paintress's monolith. Alerts the colony when a Gommage is imminent.
LanguageData.Expedition33_AntiGommageField.label: anti-gommage field generator
LanguageData.Expedition33_AntiGommageField.descriptio: An advanced generator that creates a protective field within a 15-tile radius. Colonists in this area are protected against Gommage effects, but the device consumes enormous energy.
LanguageData.Expedition33_Memorial.label: memorial to the erased
LanguageData.Expedition33_Memorial.description: A solemn monument dedicated to those who were erased by The Gommage. The names carved in stone remind that no one forgets the disappeared, even if reality has forgotten them. Improves survivors' morale.
LanguageData.Expedition33_Armory.label: expedition armory
LanguageData.Expedition33_Armory.description: A specialized workshop for crafting unique Expedition 33 equipment. The artisans who work there know the manufacturing secrets of anti-Gommage weapons, protection shields, artistic weapons and chromatic Pictos.
LanguageData.Expedition33_Chroma.label: chroma
LanguageData.Expedition33_Chroma.description: A crystalline substance with iridescent reflections, residue of pure creative energy. Chroma is the basis of all Picto manipulation and allows forging magical artifacts.
LanguageData.Expedition33_ChromaRaw.label: raw chroma
LanguageData.Expedition33_ChromaRaw.description: Raw Chroma crystals extracted from the remains of creatures corrupted by The Gommage. These fragments of corrupted energy can be purified to create usable Chroma.
LanguageData.ExpeditionScythe.label: expeditionary scythe
LanguageData.ExpeditionScythe.description: A war scythe used by Expedition 33 members. Its curved blade bears the marks of numerous battles against mysterious entities. Basic version of anti-Gommage weapons.
LanguageData.ExpeditionScythe.tools.lame.label: blade
LanguageData.ExpeditionScythe.tools.manche.label: handle
LanguageData.Expedition33_ArtisticBlade.label: artistic blade
LanguageData.Expedition33_ArtisticBlade.description: A sword imbued with creative power, specially designed to combat entities related to the Paintress. Its blade sparkles with artistic glow and deals additional damage to painted creatures.
LanguageData.Expedition33_LeverRifle.label: expedition lever rifle
LanguageData.Expedition33_LeverRifle.description: A precision lever rifle used by Expedition 33 scouts. Its reliable mechanism and range make it the weapon of choice for reconnaissance missions against mysterious entities.
LanguageData.Bullet_ExpeditionRifle.label: expedition rifle shot
LanguageData.Bullet_ArtisticRifle.label: artistic shot
LanguageData.Expedition33_CrimsonBlossom.label: crimson blossom
LanguageData.Expedition33_CrimsonBlossom.description: A deep red flower that seems to pulse with inner light.
LanguageData.Expedition33_StrangeBush.label: strange berry bush
LanguageData.Expedition33_StrangeBush.description: A mysterious bush with purple leaves bearing deep red berries that seem to pulse with inner light. It thrives in the dark atmosphere of the Dark Continent.
LanguageData.Expedition33_ShadowFern.label: shadow fern
LanguageData.Expedition33_ShadowFern.description: A fern with almost black fronds that thrives in darkness.
LanguageData.Expedition33_FlowerFern.label: flowering fern
LanguageData.Expedition33_FlowerFern.description: A small fern with almost black fronds grouped with strange flowers.
LanguageData.Expedition33_SculptedTree.label: sculpted tree
LanguageData.Expedition33_SculptedTree.description: A tree with strangely geometric branches, as if carved by invisible artisans. Its mysterious purple foliage contrasts with its natural brown trunk. It produces dark wood with unique properties, prized by Dark Continent artisans.\n\nPlant details: The Sculpted Tree is a cultivable plant that also appears wild, requiring minimum fertility of 0.3. Can be harvested for sculpted wood.
LanguageData.Projectile_EnergyWaveBullet.label: energy wave
